mapper.select: SELECT a.mbrSeq , a.mbrType , a.mbrName , a.mbrSex , a.mbrBirthday , a.mbrEmail , a.mbrPassword , a.mbrRegDt , a.mbrUdtDt , a.mbrDelNy FROM members a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.mbrSeq = #{mbrSeq}
SELECT a.cdcSeq , a.cdcName FROM code a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.cdgSeq = #{shCdgSeq} AND a.cdcDelNy = 0 ORDER BY a.cdcSeq
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members ( mbrType , mbrName , mbrSex , mbrBirthday , mbrEmail , mbrPassword , mbrRegDt , mbrUdtDt , mbrDelNy ) VALUES ( #{mbrType} , #{mbrName} , #{mbrSex} , STR_TO_DATE(#{mbrBirthday},'%Y-%m-%d %H%i%s') , #{mbrEmail} , SHA2(#{mbrPassword}, 512) , now() , now() , 0 )
